new_feature_requests.summary: Prepare a downloadable ZIP build artifact for the deployed version
Provide a Netlify-ready frontend export ZIP at `frontend/netlify-dist.zip` by running the existing Netlify export workflow so the user can manually upload it to Netlify.

Update `frontend/NETLIFY_DEPLOY.md` to include the missing one-command export instruction (including the exact command to run from the `frontend` directory) and the manual Netlify upload steps for deploying `frontend/netlify-dist.zip`.

projectName: Generate a Netlify-ready frontend ZIP for manual upload
